column4: if apt-get is taking a really long time to set up something(flashplugin), is there a way to check if it is actually doing anything or just froze?
no new text on the screen?
and why aren't you using synaptic?
it is doing the same thing in synaptic (preparing... in the gui, and setting up in the terminal portion)
yeah, afaik Synaptic won't give you any more info than apt, it's just easier to use.
is it possible it just takes a while to setup?
yes, especially if you have a relatively under-powered machine.
relatively slow, not a lot of memory.
how long has it been taking?
I'd just leave it alone (no serious stuff running) for ~10 minutes.
if it won't be done by then... something's probably wrong.
so it finished... then i got a popup error: E: Not locked and that was it
you might have tried/touched the files being updated.
definitely if you tried doing the same thing with both Synaptic and APT simultenously.
